TopicTitle: how can crew change from comando pod to landing unit?

Articles.Content: how can crew change from comando pod to landing unit in space? Do they have to leave and reenter by a trip through space?
I'm not completely sure what you are asking but I believe you EVA to the spacecraft. Or if the lander is on the ground intercept the orbiting command module and EVA to the module.
in vanilla, yes, you have to EVA and go to the crew hatch of the other module you want the kerbal in. However, there are mods which support crew transfer (Crew manifest is the one i use)
what's that landing unit you're talking about? If you're referring to the lander can, you can EVA from a command pod to another.

"commando pod" in title made me lol. "No under garments from this point forward" XD

As far as changing pods, yes you need to EVA. For RP purposes, I like to make sure my command module and lander vehicle are connected by a docking ring so that my Kerbonaughts can transfer without EVA.
